overview: It’s the most controversial & best-selling DVD we’ve ever produced. The “Montreal Screwjob” in November 1997 is still talked about and debated to this day in all forms of media, from wrestling podcasts to mainstream news. But do we even know the whole story? Could Vince McMahon and Bret Hart, seemingly destroying a 14 year friendship, have secretly been conspiring together to deceive the world?
title: The Montreal Theory
